title: All The Way Around The Lake
description:
Our story tonight is called All the way around the Lake and it’s a story about a slow walk on a cold day. It’s also about crossing bridges, a paper birch tree on an island and remembering things that were forgotten.

So get cozy and ready to sleep.

Buy the book:http://hyperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens

Get an autographed copy and other merch here: https://www.nothingmuchhappens.com/nmh-stuff

Get our ad-free and bonus episodes here: https://nothingmuchhappens.supportingcast.fm

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
author: contact@nothingmuchhappens.com (Curiouscast)
